name: A to B
description:
Student project for a course on level design. We were instructed to make a simple level with the goal of simply going for one place to another and we were restricted to using only the assets and scripts provided by the professor. 

Controls

  • WASD for movement
  • Mouse for camera movement
  • Shift to sprint
  • Ctrl to crouch
  • F to interact
  • Space to jump
